comment: Super easy. Took as a summer class. 3 weekly assignments and two major projects, no tests. Shes very nice and accessible outside of class

Take her if you can! Gives clear directions and feedback. Responds quick. 10/10 professor I would take her for any psychology class if that is your major! This past summer semester, I had issues with turning in an assignment the day that final grades were due, she gave me the opportunity to fix it and I still got an A in the class!
Such an amazing teacher for intro to Psychology!! She's very engaged with students, the class in general was super easy to understand.
Took her class Fall 2024, and really enjoyed it! Multiple grades do get dropped throughout the semester in each grading category. Overall it was an enjoyable class; not too easy but not hard.

This class was super enjoyable. I failed 3/4 tests and still managed to finish with an A. She drops one full test grade, so that really helps you out. There are also so many other assignments that you will be OK if you aren't a great test taker. I highly recommend her class; she is very engaged with us during her lectures. TAKE HER

I truly enjoyed Professor DiMercurio!! She is the best PSYC teacher I have had at KSU. She truly knows and is interested in what she teaches which makes the class enjoyable to be apart of! She is a tough grader but it is much appreciated! If you have her as an option for a class TAKE IT!

Shes decent. Not a terrible professor, just make sure to attend every class because she does surprise in class assignments. Also her SI's are very annoying. Like extremely annoying. You'll get an email from the SI every morning and night. It's like an alarm that you hate.
Very great and engaging lectures! The only reason I have a C is my own fault. Test are in person tho!

I loved Dr. DiMercurio. She was funny and was very knowledgeable about what she was teaching. She makes sure to give you everything she can provide to help you succeed and she is kind about everything. I suggest when studying for her exams you make quizlets about everything she talks about. If you're happy with your grade, you can exempt the final.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She's a wonderful person and teacher. Grades fair and very flexible with grades. 50% of your grade is just completion assignments. She's so sweet and tries to make class interactive, its lecture heavy and can be boring, but she tries to make it interesting, interactive, and teaches well, Research methods takes work, but she makes it better by far.

She is a lovely person but I was bored the whole class. Class is easy but I wouldn't take again because she spends most the time just talking and i cant focus on what she says. Everything is posted online tho so attendance isn't required. At most, 2 simple assignments due per week. There is a book, but not needed if you take notes.

I love her teaching style! She treats everyone equally, welcomes feedback, and is super positive during office hours. A typical day involves a presentation, followed by a Kahoot, then discussing with neighbors and repeating the cycle. She doesn't take attendance, posts all materials on D2L, and assignments are clear and easy to follow.

Love, love, loveeeee her. Her lectures are so engaging and she connects the content to real-life examples which makes it easier to remember. She's funny and on the last day before the test she'll do a kahoot with exam like questions that appear on the exam. Her class isn't hard at all and this was a great class. I would take her 100x over.

I loved her and will be taking her again. It can be hard to keep your eyes open in class but you only have 1 in-class assignment per week, usually the last day of class. She has a dry humor to me so she makes me laugh when im in class. Theres a group project you work on all semester, pick a decent group and its easy.

I took her for psych 1100 and psych 3205. If you want to get an easy A in psychology courses, TAKE HER ASAP. For psych 1100, don't worry if you mess up on her exams.. I literally failed like 3 of them and still got an A lol. Weekly homework but very easy and based on her d2l slides. Go to class because she does an in-class assignment once a week.

I would not recommend taking her four-week summer course unless absolutely necessary. Her workload is ungodly for the four-week course. Grades pretty easily, but be prepared to have to complete a ton of unnecessary assignments.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Lots of homework

comment: Strong lecturer who is a fair grader. Tests are in person but are generally pretty manageable if you study for them. Attendance is not technically mandatory but there are 1 per unit "in class activities" for a grade that you will get a zero on if you don't show up to class.

I LOVE THIS PROFESSOR SO MUCH!!!!! her lectures are very educational and engaging, she does kahoot to review for exams, and posts weekly assignments on d2l. the homework she assigns isn't hard at all, it's very easy to get done. just make sure to go to class in case of in-class assignments. TAKE HER!!!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Inspirational

comment: I loved this professor!! She was so nice and her lectures were very entertaining! She always had the best study tips that always got me a high grade on our exams. There are only 4 exams throughout the semester so not too test heavy. Definitely recommend Dr. DiMercurio!

Dr.DiMercurio truly cares about her students provides a bunch of grades in order to ensure her students success and gives extra credit opportunities. Attendance is technically not mandatory but once a week she assigns an in class assignment. However, she drops your three lowest grades in that area so not coming once won't negatively affect you.

Dr. D is a great professor. She makes the course very approachable and she loves teaching it. Her expectations are very clear and she is very fair in her grading. I failed a test and still got an A in the class. It's just coming to class and doing the work. Weekly open note quiz and chapter discussion on D2L. Can't recommend her enough!

Taker her! Everything is clear and grades are structured to where tests don't count as much. Final is a group research proposal. Lets us work in groups and talk to each other. Has in class assignments, but so far they haven't been too often. She is very experienced and wants to help us understand!

Dr DiMercurio is one of the BEST professors I had!!! She reallyyyyyyy cares about the students, gives good thorough lectures, has group discussions in class and makes sure you understand the material. Exams aren't the easiest but if you put 100% effort in studying and do the quizzes you'll get a good grade.
Enjoyed this professor very much. Made effort to keep class engaging. Usually would have group participation activities. Also homework wasn't a ton. 100% recommend!
I took her for research methods in psychology. She is amazing, just make sure to come to class and participate and you will pass!
One of the best professors I have ever had. I would definitely take her class again. I highly recommend taking her.

Dr. DiMercurio is an amazing professor, I cannot recommend her enough! Research Methods can be scary but she made this class SO enjoyable. Clear/engaging lectures, helpful practice homework, and 3 exams. The main grades are 7 group research proposal assignments, culminating in a final paper and presentation. I will be taking her again for sure!
